name: Earthling Artists Agency
description:
Manage a roster of incredible talent, tour exotic locations around the world, and upgrade your agency from dinghy office to dazzling penthouse in Earthling Artists Agency v0.1!

Please take our 3-question survey located here to help guide the development cycle.

** Note that all assets are For Placement Only **

We appreciate your contributions, and look forward to delivering the best quality experience we can.

Are you an artist or musician interested in creating for Earthling Artists Agency? We will be taking submissions prior to launch on art and music. Please feel free to send us your portfolio here, and we will add you to our list of consideration for paid work.

Planned for v0.2:

  • Pan around game world and behold more scenery.
  • Improve background music.
  • Improve pathing engine.
  • Streamline number of clicks in gameplay, including the option to automate tours.
  • More art!
  • More music!
  • Much more to be announced!
